attributes.description:
If you are looking for a quality Pre-Owned Vehicles then look no further.  Our vehicles go through a 108 -point quality check to ensure that you are getting value for your money.  
Book a test drive today to experience this vehicle.  Delivery can be arranged nationwide. Price excludes admin and delivery fee. Finance can be arranged on premises and trade- ins are welcome. We at Motus Mazda Germiston strive for perfection, so that you as the customer can make the most of each moment and opportunity while shopping for the perfect vehicle to suit your needs so please do take a stroll on our showroom floor. We give you peace of mind knowing that every vehicle is subject to a stringent Check List.  
You are welcome to speak to one of our Finance consultants for a tailored financial package to suite your needs or one of our Sales Executives, to help with all your vehicle requirements.

attributes.description:
Motus Nissan Centurion offers nationwide delivery to all of our valued customers as well as our very
own Finance and Insurance Manager who is ready to help with finance at our dealership
or over the phone for your CONVENIENCE in a matter of MINUTES with all 4 major banks. All of our vehicles come
with a 160-point QUALITY Check meaning they check every part of the vehicle to make sure it is
101% Roadworthy as well as 101% PERFECT just for you! Please note that the price
advertised excludes our Documentation, License and Delivery fees all at one standard
price. Test Drives and Trade Ins are most certainly welcome.
MOTUS NISSAN CENTURION, where customers become friends

attributes.description:
Don't wait, call now to book your test drive...
All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and an EXTRA quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our Nissan Parow Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit your needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced and professional Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you here on our safe and spacious showroom. Contact the Motus Nissan Parow TEAM NOW!

available on request.  Trade ins are welcome.

attributes.description: Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Toyota Bedfordview.
